title: Firefox Search Engine Delay
content:
Firefox has recently started to show weird behaviour.

Here is the description of the behaviour:

I go to a default Google Search Website (google.com) and type something in search bar on the website (not the URL bar, but the actual Google Search bar that is on the website.). Then, I hit "Enter". And, then something odd happens. After I hit "Enter", the entire Google Search Website freezes for about 5-7 seconds. During the freeze, I cannot interact with the Website in any way. After 5-7 seconds, Google Search Website loads as usual and shows the search results. The delay and the freeze only occurs from time to time.

Here are some other details:

1) Other browsers do not show this behaviour (Chrome, Edge). 2) Other search engines do show this behaviour (DuckDuckGo).

What I tried to fix the issue:

1) Reinstall Firefox. 2) Cleaned Cache, Cookies. Cleared History.

Extensions Installed: 1) Only Ublock Origin


Can you help fixing the weird delay and freeze? It never happened before
creator: theoldfriend12

title: can't complete account verification, no cell phone, keep running out of time, eetc. help!
content: I need foxfire to get my emails but haven't been able to verify account... I don't have a cell phone. I used to get emails from Microsoft Edge but can't since recent update. Help, I live alone, am disabled and retired. Thanks, Diana 352 300 3090
